choice.title: PROS Components
choice.description: Select which PROS components you would like to install.

choice.title: PROS CLI
choice.description: The PROS Command Line Interface (CLI) is the tool that handles PROS project management as well as flashing to the microcontroller.

choice.title: PROS Toolchain
choice.description: The PROS toolchain is a set of publicly available binaries (gcc-arm-none-eabi) that facilitate cross-compiling program binaries for ARM-based microcontrollers. If you already have this installed, you should not install this component.

choice.title: PROS Editor
choice.description: The PROS Editor is a repackaged version of the Atom text editor, by GitHub. If you wish to use a different editor, you do not need to install this component.
